abstract: Lakshmi Mittal is looking at entering the takeover battle for the Rio Tinto mining group, The Financial Times reported on Monday, quoting people familiar with the situation.
lead_paragraph: Lakshmi Mittal is looking at entering the takeover battle for the Rio Tinto mining group, The Financial Times reported on Monday, quoting people familiar with the situation.

headline.main: Mittal Said to Consider Bidding for Rio Tinto
